about_the_game:
Masamune Kashin, a young wizard belonging to the Great Land Kingdom's magical forces, and Amelie Blanchett are tasked with infiltrating the Caledonia Magic University.

The mission involves verifying rumors of demon summoning taking place at the magic university.

Amelie is determined to succeed, not only for the advancement of her wizarding status but also to confess her love to Masamune.

Meanwhile, Masamune, still optimistic, is thinking of other things.

"A mission just for the two of us... I'll confess my feelings to Amelie here."

However, various schemes are swirling around the Caledonia Magic University.

Masamune is not the only one who is attracted to the charming Amelie Blanchett.

Unexpected struggles in the mission, the appearance of a mysterious girl in front of the failed Masamune, and a week looping through magic.

Where will the story lead...

Amelie Blanshett

【Height】163cm

【Place of Origin】Great Land Kingdom

She has shown talent in magic since childhood, and her abilities were recognized, leading to an invitation to join the Magic Corps.

She is like an elder sister figure to the protagonist.

She has a kind and cheerful personality, and is diligent and hardworking.

Jackson Steinfeld

Representative of the Magic Research Club in his third year.

Talented in magic, ambitious.

Has a personality that doesn't hesitate to use any means for his goals.

Leon Amador

He is handsome and kind, and gets along well with everyone.

He has a complex about not having much talent in magic.

He likes girls, and has several ex-girlfriends among his classmates.

Hiori Kamono

She has a modest and earnest personality.

She has good grades and is trusted by the teachers.

She belongs to the Student Council.

Elena Fontaine

She likes handsome guys and is the center of attention in her class.

She has a tough personality, but she is devoted to the person she loves.

She belongs to the Magic Research Club.

Professor Hoffman

He is a professor of magic and the advisor to the student council.

He is very strict with the school rules and is not popular among students.

He is also strict with female students as a teacher.

Caledonia Magic University

A prestigious magic school located in the northern part of the Great Land Kingdom.

It has the longest history among magic schools and has produced numerous famous wizards.

There are various clubs related to magic, such as the Magic Research Club.

The northern region is the front line of the battle against demons, and monsters occasionally emerge, resulting in poor public safety.

  • Classic JRPG

  • Exploration

  • Puzzle-solving

  • Diverse maps

  • Rich storyline content

  • Turn-based combat
